metadata.title: CVE-2020-10648 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Das U-Boot through 2020.01 allows attackers to bypass verified bootrestrictions and subsequently boot arbitrary images by providing a craftedFIT image to a system configured to boot the default configuration.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
